WRITING.TEXT: Great longread: "How did the candidate of hope and change turn into the president of secret kill lists, drone strikes hitting civilians, and immunity for torturers? The answer may lie in his relationship with the CIA director, a career bureaucrat turned quiet architect of a morally murky national security policy who isnt going to let a little thing like getting caught spying on the Senate bring him down."
